EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Top Ten Features #6: Health Chart
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Here's number six of ten Turbonomic Top Features. Of course, if at any time you want to accelerate your learning, you can visit the Green Circle Community <[[https://greencircle.turbonomic.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid06]]> and gain tips and tricks from real Turbonomic customers and evaluators just like you. Feature #6: Health Chart
The Health Chart within the Assure Service Performance dashboard is the inspiration for Turbonomic's logo. Under automation, Turbonomic continuously drives Actions that keep the Health Chart 100% Green. The Health Chart helps you answer the following questions:
- What is the health of my entire virtual and physical infrastructure?
Step-By-Step: Health Chart
The following steps will guide you through the Health Chart:
- Health Chart is located in the Assure Service Performance dashboard and shows the current status of Hosts, Storage, or Virtual Machines in your environment. Green = Normal, Yellow = Minor, Orange = Major, and Red = Critical - Click on the Red portion of the pie chart to view the most critical issues, and the ! Icon to view the specific resolutions for these issues - For each portion of the pie chart, the ! Icon toggles between the Risk/Opportunity and To Do lists
- Click the Graph Icon to bring up details information about the target of the recommended Action
